pages.text: Castlereagh is a castle located on a remote, rocky island near the shore. It is frequently resupplied by merchant ships.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/mortar)$(l)Mega Mortar/$$(br)Castlereagh's rooftop houses a massive mortar, which will $(l)fire 9 cannonballs at a 5x5 area/$. This ability has $(l)1 Use/$ and costs $(l)16 Energy to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/energy_grant)$(l)Energetic Release/$$(br)$(l)Upon being destroyed/$, Castlereagh's stored artefacts break and $(l)restore 4 Energy/$ to your fleet.
pages.title: Passive Ability
